subproblems.subproblem_context: Using Boolean algebra, find the simplest Boolean algebra equation for the following min-terms: ∑(1111, 1110, 1000, 1001, 1011, 1010, 0000). Show your work step-by-step.
Convert the following Boolean equation so that it only contains NOR operations. Show your work step-by-step.
subproblems.subproblem_solution:
F = ((A+A+ (B.C +A.C)) + ((A+A+ (B.C +A.C)) 
 B.C = B +B + C + C 
 A.C = A+A+ C + C + C + C 
 F = ((A+ (B.C +A.C)) 
 F = ((A+ (B.C +A.C)) + ((A+ (B.C +A.C)) 
 F = ((A+A+ (B.C +A.C)) + ((A+A+ (B.C +A.C)) 
 B.C = B +B + C + C 
 A.C = A+A+ C + C + C + C
